posts.post_content:
Slap your choice of [Zendikon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=197865) on a [Forbidden Orchard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Forbidden Orchard) for infinite mana.  
Proceed to win with any infinite mana finisher ([Banefire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Banefire), [Blue Sun's Zenith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blue Sun's Zenith)) or for hilarity, [Massacre Wurm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Massacre Wurm).

posts.post_content:
[Intruder Alarm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Intruder Alarm) + [Library of Leng](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Library of Leng) + [Spirit Cairn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spirit Cairn) + [Cephalid Looter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cephalid Looter) + [Forbidding Watchtower](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Forbidding Watchtower).  
  
Alternatives include [Merfolk Looter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Merfolk Looter), [Krosan Restorer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Krosan Restorer), [Harvester Druid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Harvester Druid), [Quirion Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quirion Elves).  
  
*By far* not the best combo, but these were the cards I had, and it was fun finding something that worked within my age-old collection.
posts.html:
Intruder Alarm + Library of Leng + Spirit Cairn + Cephalid Looter + Forbidding Watchtower.

Alternatives include Merfolk Looter, Krosan Restorer, Harvester Druid, Quirion Elves.

By far not the best combo, but these were the cards I had, and it was fun finding something that worked within my age-old collection.

posts.post_content: I was in a multiplayer game where someone was about to use this to generate infinite 1/1 tokens. Someone else equipped a lowly creature with a [Viridian Longbow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viridian Longbow). I realized that the creature equipped with the Longbow will untap as soon as the first 1/1 token enters the battlefield, infinitely trumping the infinite tokens.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
This is the card that awakened my inner Johnny.  
Like some of you, I have spent a lot of time searching on the internet and by myself ideas to fuel the posibilities.  
What I use with mine (was standard legal at the time mind you) : [Wirewood Channeler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wirewood Channeler) and [Centaur Glade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Centaur Glade).  
And in the same deck there's also [Pemmin's Aura](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pemmin's Aura) (for the channeler....yeah)  
-  
I know that this idea was on the building on a budget section, some 9-10 years ago, but still, it was my very first infinite combo. Just thinking about it makes me smile and feel very nostalgic...
